mapper.insert: insert into student(stu_name, stu_email, stu_course) values (#{stu_name},#{stu_email},#{stu_course})
mapper.update: update student set stu_name=#{stu_name}, stu_email=#{stu_email} , stu_course =#{stu_course} where stu_id = #{stu_id}
mapper.select: select * from student order by stu_id desc
